channel.title: ThiS MaIn [ERR{o+r!
channel.description:
okay guys i would like to say every time i ran a server I keep getting this dummy error -.-
[code] [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: java.io.IOExc eption: Unable to establish loopback connection [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:106 ) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Me thod) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(PipeImpl.java:122) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(SelectorProv iderImpl.java:27) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Pipe.java:133) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(WindowsSelector Impl.java:104) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Windo wsSelectorProvider.java:26) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at java.nio.channels.Selector.open(Selector.java:209) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.s tartupWorker(SocketAcceptor.java:162) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.b ind(SocketAcceptor.java:141) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:127) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: co nnect [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Native Method) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(SocketChannelImp l.java:500) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(SocketChannel.ja va:146) [10/17/11 9:24 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(PipeImpl.java:78)
[10/17/11 9:24 PM]: ... 10 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Im using jdk1.6.0_26 and its recognized on my comp so can someone help me I get this on all running sources after I formated my computer.

okay guys i would like to say every time i ran a server I keep getting this dummy error -.-
